title: 2 Bedroom Loft For Rent
posting_body: 2 Bedroom / 2 Bath Apartment available in River North's One River Place Condominium Association.
Situated right along the Chicago River's North Branch, the unit boasts 12-foot loft-style ceilings and Northern exposure drenching the unit with plenty of afternoon sunlight and exceptional sunsets.
Just steps away from the buildings beautiful rooftop W/ exceptional views of the city skyline.
In-unit Washer & Dryer, Dishwasher, granite counter tops, hard wood floors, and Standard Cable & HBO included.
1 Months Security Deposit due at lease signing.

Building Amenities include 24/7 Doorman, Controlled Package Delivery, Rooftop Deck, Outdoor Grilling Stations, Fitness Center, On-Site Dry Cleaning / Laundry, Bike Room, Overflow Storage Unit, and Heated Indoor Garage Parking Available.

Neighborhood offers close access to highways, Chicago CTA Brown & Purple Line Station, Chicago Avenue 66 Bus Line, and various River North / West Loop / Gold Coast / West Town Dining & Nightlife options.
